reoccuringEvent.variables: these change as the game progresses ie a phone contract

intro.text: You want to buy a house and need a loan
To realise this dream you must build up your credit rating
A good credit rating will show the bank you are a responsible customer, able to pay off your debts
To increase your credit rating you will need a credit card
Now you have the choice to pay by cash or card
Paying by card will build up your credit rating
Paying by cash will affect your savings
You will be paid monthly and must decide how to manage this

finaleWin.text: You walk into the bank with your head held high
Thanks to your excellent credit rating, you're sure the bank will want to lend to you!
You sit down with a lovely bank advisor who talks about your many options
You walk out of the bank, not quite believing you will soon be a homeowner

finaleLose.text: You walk into the bank, feeling a bit nervous
You have not always been as careful with money as you could
You sit down with a lovely bank advisor who gently tells you that they can't help you
You walk out of the bank, swearing that you will be more careful with money in the future

chapterOne.text: Now you have a credit card you need to learn how to use it
To build credit you need to spend using you card
Be careful, everything you spend must be paid back
How you will pay back your monthly debt?
There is an opportunity at work for career development
An initial expense but could lead to a bigger monthly wage.
Your friends want to go on holiday and want you to go.
The holiday dates clash with the the career development option.
Let's hope you made the right choice!

chapterTwo.text: A friend is having a party, you need a new outfit
What are you going to wear? Remember to spend within your means
Nice. You are going to be the sharpest dressed at the party!

chapterThree.text: At the party you went for an unexpected swim...
Maybe you were pushed in the pool...
Either way you need to get a new phone.
You could take this phone out on credit and need an affordable contract.
Sometimes if you have the cash it can be smart to pay for things in full.
If you are trying to build credit and are comfortable having monthly payments using a credit card can be useful.
What phone do you want? Sim only, contract?
you are sure your new phone will serve you well, though you won't be taking it anywhere near a pool for a while

chapterFour.text: Don't forget to be building a good credit rating
Spending and paying off your credit debt is a good way to build a credit rating
What do you want to do tonight?
I'm sure you'll have a great time

educationSnippets: Using a credit card can help build good credit when managed well.
You have more purchasing options when using a credit card.
A credit card can help if you are in need of emegency funds.
Some credit cards will offer rewards for choosing to go with their card.
There can be a temptation to spend more when you own a credit card.
Due to the workings of a credit card using one will reduce your future income.
Misuse of a credit card can lead to debt.
Although security is imporving you can be exposed to credit card fraud.
Credit cards can come with confusing terms and conditions.
Using a credit card is often quicker than paying in cash.
Certain laws protect you as the consumer if you pay with plastic and lose your receipt.
You can pay off credit debt in installments if necessary.
Using a credit card at a cash machine will incure an extra cost
